content.webTitle: 2015 Golden Globes: full list of nominations

fields.headline: 2015 Golden Globes: full list of nominations
fields.bodyText: Best motion picture – drama Boyhood Foxcatcher The Imitation Game Selma The Theory of Everything Best performance by an actor in a motion picture – drama Steve Carell, Foxcatcher Benedict Cumberbatch, The Imitation Game Jake Gyllenhaal, Nightcrawler David Oyelowo, Selma Eddie Redmayne, The Theory of Everything Best performance by an actress in a motion picture – drama Jennifer Hotel Into the Woods Pride St Vincent Best performance by an actor in a motion picture – comedy or musical Ralph Fiennes, The Grand Budapest Hotel Michael Keaton, Birdman Bill Murray, St Vincent
